abstract: The central bank will continue to offer liquidity to banks that have trouble obtaining short-term funds from other banks or in the money markets.
snippet: The central bank will continue to offer liquidity to banks that have trouble obtaining short-term funds from other banks or in the money markets.
lead_paragraph: FRANKFURT  The European Central Bank offered a slightly more optimistic view of the euro area’s economy Thursday, but also extended its lifeline to troubled banks in the zone amid signs that the gap in growth between Northern and Southern Europe was growing.

headline.main: European Central Bank Optimistic About Economy
headline.print_headline: Trichet More Optimistic About European Economy
